actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An Act to provide a 2-month extension of the exemption for loans made to finance the acquisition of previously occupied residential dwellings from the prohibition against financing by federally-related financial institutions for property located in communities not participating in the national flood insurance program.

summary.text: Extends from January 1, 1976 until March 1, 1976 the final date of the exemption for loans made to finance the acquisition of previously occupied residential dwellings from the prohibition against financing by federally-related financial institutions for property located in communities not participating in the national flood insurance program.

titles.title: A joint resolution providing for the extension of the Flood Disaster Act.

An Act to provide a 2-month extension of the exemption for loans made to finance the acquisition of previously occupied residential dwellings from the prohibition against financing by federally-related financial institutions for property located in communities not participating in the national flood insurance program.
